projects.name: Export e-marketplace
projects.techstack: Java1.8, SpringBoot, Microservices, Spring Core, Spring REST, Spring MVC, Spring JPA, MySQL, Maven, AWS, IntelliJ, Jenkins, Log4J, Mockito, Kafka, Redis Cache
projects.description: Export e-marketplace is a business-to-business online marketplace, designed to facilitate transactions and interactions between buyers and sellers globally. It serves as a centralized hub where global buyers can place any customized order as per their requirement and respective sellers will see the order in their dashboard and initiate the handshake.

projects.name: IBM Sunset
projects.techstack: Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Microservices, REST, Postgres, DB2, Kafka
projects.description: This project is for migration of Architecture based on Mainframe jobs and ETL to microservices based application in Java.

projects.name: Client Banking Group (CBG)
projects.techstack: Java, Spring Boot, Oracle, JSP, JS, REST
projects.description: This project is designed for clients to manage their processes, content, and communications for connected operations. It enables automated validation and verification for numerous banking tasks.

projects.name: Customer Management Solution (CMS)
projects.description: This project is designed for customer Service portal that aims to improve the quality, turnaround time and service for end-customers. It enables improvement in the agility, transparency and efficiency for providing customer solutions. As a customer management solution, it enabled e-commerce to automate the processes for achieving cost savings and enhanced customer experience.
